text: Vogue reportedly has exclusive rights to photos from the Serena Williams - Alexis Ohanian wedding in New Orleans on Thursday ( Nov. 16 ) at the Contemporary Arts Center, so it's no surprise they have a story Friday on what guest Kim Kardashian West wore to the nuptials. ` ` For the occasion, Kardashian West wore a simple, black dress, a recent find on the app she's invested in, ScreenShop,'' Vogue posted Friday. ` ` Kardashian West said of the piece,'I'm really into effortless, clean lines,'when she spoke to Vogue earlier this month.'' Read the full Vogue report here and see a larger photo. Kim Kardashian attended Serena Williams's wedding in true minimalist fashion. https :
